o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_ParentAttributeFQCode
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:GetMethodScript:
Function %Get%(obj) 'Initialize the return value to an empty string. %Get% = ""
' Get the parent source object and attribute. Dim objParentSourceObject : Set objParentSourceObject = obj.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_ParentSourceObject") Dim objParentAttribute : Set objParentAttribute = obj.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_ParentAttribute") Dim strParentLiteralValue : strParentLiteralValue = obj.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_ParentLiteralValue")
' If a literal value is specified, use that. If Len(strParentLiteralValue) > 0 Then %Get% = strParentLiteralValue ' If the child attribute is not empty, return the FQ name. ElseIf Not(objParentSourceObject Is Nothing) And Not(objParentAttribute Is Nothing) Then %Get% = objParentSourceObject.Code & "." & objParentAttribute.Code End If
End Function
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Label: Fully qualified parent attribute code
